title: Ep 148: Building A Mystery with Louise Penny
itunes:title: Ep 148: Building A Mystery with Louise Penny
itunes:subtitle: Kate accidentally turns off all her email notifications and experiences a stress free weekend, and Doree wonders when the last time she showered was and prepares to play tennis. Then, the welcome author Louise Penny ( Chief Inspector Gamache mysteries,...
description:
Kate accidentally turns off all her email notifications and experiences a stress free weekend, and Doree wonders when the last time she showered was and prepares to play tennis. Then, the welcome author Louise Penny ( Chief Inspector Gamache mysteries, most recently All The Devils Are Here) to talk about her one-book-a-year writing pace, finding her indoor exercise activity, and why food plays such an important role in her books.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
